title: Pixel 4 XL Crashes exclusively during any loud sounds / sounds and video
content:
Since getting the Pixel 4 XL I have had it randomly reset / power-down abruptly. It started relatively benign at first. I assumed it had to do with applications and the software being updated, but as I spend more and more time with the phone the issues continue and have gotten more intense.

There have been several occasions where the phone's display would cut out and a large pixelated area would occur across the display. On one occasion the phone would not turn on at all causing me to do a hard reset. 

If there are any suggestions I'm up for it.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
